description:
Leol (レオル) is a Chimera Ant squadron leader resembling an anthropomorphic lion, albeit with tiger-like stripes. Originally named Hagya (ハギャ), he was a lion in a past life. Leol is among the Chimera Ants who eat humans meant for the Queen, and later develops an interest in Nen users.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Leol
